attributes.action: Reverse High Court decision to criminalise format-shifting
attributes.background: Recently a high court ruling made the format-shifting (i.e. ripping) of cd's /other media illegal as a change to a law that allowed for this as a form of fair use. The decision to reverse this was an action that show a sheer lack of understanding about how music is consumed in the 21st century.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105816

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
